items.sentence: Tom is very busy every afternoon, but he often has some free time in the morning.
Tom decided it wasn\'t really necessary to deal with that problem this afternoon.
I couldn't but sympathize with the girl who had lost her parents in the accident.
I'm glad that I wasn't the one who had to tell Tom that his wife had been killed.
I spent the whole morning with you, so I'm going to spend the afternoon with Tom.
